body:
closes #5506

The application of patches to upstream executables has been reworked according to the suggestions of the main developer in #5506. In particular we are not maintaining a dictionary that maps plumed versions to the versions of patchable executables, and we are using a non-interactive command to patch applications.

All the comments on substituting plumed at run-time do not apply here, since we use RPATH and we want to maintain a 1:1 relationship between the DAG hash and the plumed library used.
title: plumed: reworked patching applications, added new version
